description: Experienced Software Engineer with a focus on web development, bringing 7 years of industry experience to the table. Proficient in Node.js, Typescript, React, Vue.js, Lua, and C++, I possess a strong drive and ambition to utilize my skills in creative problem-solving. My goal is to design, develop, and optimize systems and software that drive growth and sustainability. With a proven track record, I confidently approach complex challenges, delivering innovative solutions of the highest quality.
